name: part_000
file: tmp_【#兎田ぺこら6周年記念LIVE】周年3D LIVE！ぺこらRUSH！！！！！！！ぺこ！【ホロライブ⧸兎田ぺこら】 [E2D_YFRHFG8]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_000.mov

scenes.description: Intro animation celebrating Usada Pekora's 6th anniversary, featuring 2D artwork of Pekora and her 'Nousagi' fans.
Usada Pekora performs the song 'Soko ni Aru ka mo Shirenai' (Maybe It's There) from 'Osu! Banchou' on a 3D stage wearing a yukata.
scenes.song_name: Soko ni Aru ka mo Shirenai

subtitles.original:
USADA PEKORA
周年3D LIVE ぺこらRUSH！！
subtitles.english:
USADA PEKORA
Anniversary 3D LIVE Pekora RUSH!!

subtitles.original: 君に逢いたい時だって
subtitles.english: Even when I want to see you

subtitles.original: どこか逢えない気持ちがある
subtitles.english: There's a feeling I can't meet you somewhere

subtitles.original: だけど本当の優しさが
subtitles.english: But true kindness

subtitles.original: そこにあるかも知れない
subtitles.english: Might be right there

subtitles.original:
そこにあるかも知れない…
～Special Full Version～
subtitles.english:
Maybe It's There...
~Special Full Version~

subtitles.original: 人込みに揺られてる
subtitles.english: Swayed by the crowd

subtitles.original: どこかに宛てがあるわけじゃない
subtitles.english: It's not like I have a destination

subtitles.original: 独りきり歩いても
subtitles.english: Even if I walk alone

subtitles.original: 何か解決することじゃない
subtitles.english: It's not something that will solve anything

subtitles.original: 自分が本当に望んでる
subtitles.english: What I truly desire

subtitles.original: 気持ちはきっと
subtitles.english: This feeling, for sure

subtitles.original: これから二人で歩いて行くことさ
subtitles.english: Is to walk together from now on

subtitles.original:
※この配信は演出により激しく点滅する場面がございます
部屋を明るくし画面から十分離れてご視聴ください
subtitles.english:
Intense flashing lights. Watch in a bright room
and stay a safe distance from the screen.

subtitles.original: 君に逢いたい時だって
subtitles.english: Even when I want to see you

subtitles.original: どこか逢えない気持ちがある
subtitles.english: There's a feeling I can't meet you somewhere

subtitles.original: だけど本当の優しさが
subtitles.english: But true kindness

subtitles.original: そこにあるかも知れない
subtitles.english: Might be right there

subtitles.original: 二人輝いた季節は
subtitles.english: The season when we two sparkled

subtitles.original: きっとこれからも続いていく
subtitles.english: Will surely continue from now on

subtitles.original: だから大切な未来に
subtitles.english: So, to the precious future

subtitles.original: この想いを残したい
subtitles.english: I want to leave these feelings behind

subtitles.original: 飽きるまで話しても
subtitles.english: Even if we talk until we're tired

subtitles.original: 全部分かり合えるわけじゃない
subtitles.english: We won't understand everything

subtitles.original: 言葉より伝えたい
subtitles.english: More than words, I want to convey

subtitles.original: 気持ちがこの胸に溢れてる
subtitles.english: The feelings overflowing in my heart

subtitles.original: 君がいつか探した夢の
subtitles.english: Of the dream you once searched for

subtitles.original: 続きはきっと二人で描いて行こう
subtitles.english: Let's draw the continuation together

subtitles.original: 忘れないで
subtitles.english: Don't forget

subtitles.original: 独りきり孤独なようで
subtitles.english: As if being all alone and lonely

subtitles.original: 皆何かに悩んでいる
subtitles.english: Everyone is worrying about something

subtitles.original: すぐには変わらないけれど
subtitles.english: Though it won't change immediately

subtitles.original: とにかく信じていたい
subtitles.english: Anyway, I want to believe

subtitles.original: 流した涙捨て去って
subtitles.english: Throwing away the tears I've shed

subtitles.original: ずっと君のそばで生きたい
subtitles.english: I want to live by your side forever

subtitles.original: いつか振り返った時に
subtitles.english: When I look back someday

subtitles.original: 後悔したくないから
subtitles.english: Because I don't want to regret it
